subjects.name: Hammer Time
subjects.description: Gain Empower on a Heavy Attack, increasing attack damage by {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_HeavyEmpower.DMGStandard * 100]}% for {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_HeavyEmpower.BaseDuration]} seconds.
subjects.parsed_description: Gain Empower on a Heavy Attack, increasing attack damage by 20.0% for 4.0 seconds.
subjects.en_description: Gain Empower on a Heavy Attack, increasing attack damage by {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_HeavyEmpower.DMGStandard * 100]}% for {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_HeavyEmpower.BaseDuration]} seconds.
subjects.de_description: Du erhältst bei einem schweren Angriff Ermächtigung, wodurch dein Angriffsschaden für {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_HeavyEmpower.BaseDuration]} Sekunden um {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_HeavyEmpower.DMGStandard * 100]} % steigt.
subjects.fr_description: Confère renforcement aux attaques lourdes et augmente les dégâts d'attaque de {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_HeavyEmpower.DMGStandard * 100]} % pendant {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_HeavyEmpower.BaseDuration]} secondes.
subjects.es_description: Obtienes Fortalecimiento en un ataque pesado, lo que aumenta en un {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_HeavyEmpower.DMGStandard * 100]} % el daño de ataque durante {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_HeavyEmpower.BaseDuration]} s.
subjects.it_description: Ottieni Potenziamento con un attacco pesante, aumentando i danni da attacco di un {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_HeavyEmpower.DMGStandard * 100]}% per {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_HeavyEmpower.BaseDuration]} secondi.
subjects.pl_description: Trafienie ciężkim atakiem zapewnia wzmocnienie zwiększające zadawane obrażenia o {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_HeavyEmpower.DMGStandard * 100]}% na {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_HeavyEmpower.BaseDuration]} s.
subjects.pt_description: Concede Energizado em um Ataque Pesado, aumentando o dano do ataque em {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_HeavyEmpower.DMGStandard * 100]}% durante {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_HeavyEmpower.BaseDuration]} s.
subjects.en_parsed_description: Gain Empower on a Heavy Attack, increasing attack damage by 20.0% for 4.0 seconds.
subjects.de_parsed_description: Du erhältst bei einem schweren Angriff Ermächtigung, wodurch dein Angriffsschaden für 4.0 Sekunden um 20.0 % steigt.
subjects.fr_parsed_description: Confère renforcement aux attaques lourdes et augmente les dégâts d'attaque de 20.0 % pendant 4.0 secondes.
subjects.es_parsed_description: Obtienes Fortalecimiento en un ataque pesado, lo que aumenta en un 20.0 % el daño de ataque durante 4.0 s.
subjects.it_parsed_description: Ottieni Potenziamento con un attacco pesante, aumentando i danni da attacco di un 20.0% per 4.0 secondi.
subjects.pl_parsed_description: Trafienie ciężkim atakiem zapewnia wzmocnienie zwiększające zadawane obrażenia o 20.0% na 4.0 s.
subjects.pt_parsed_description: Concede Energizado em um Ataque Pesado, aumentando o dano do ataque em 20.0% durante 4.0 s.

subjects.name: Armor Breaker
subjects.description: A Powerful swing that penetrates {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Ability_WarHammer_ArmorBreaker.ArmorPenetration * 100]}% of the Target's armor and deals {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_ArmorBreaker.DmgCoef * 100]}% Weapon damage.
subjects.parsed_description: A Powerful swing that penetrates 35.0% of the Target's armor and deals 140.0% Weapon damage.
subjects.en_description: A Powerful swing that penetrates {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Ability_WarHammer_ArmorBreaker.ArmorPenetration * 100]}% of the Target's armor and deals {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_ArmorBreaker.DmgCoef * 100]}% Weapon damage.
subjects.de_description: Ein mächtiger Schwung, der {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Ability_WarHammer_ArmorBreaker.ArmorPenetration * 100]} % der Rüstung des Ziels durchdringt und {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_ArmorBreaker.DmgCoef * 100]} % Waffenschaden verursacht.
subjects.fr_description: Un coup puissant qui pénètre {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Ability_WarHammer_ArmorBreaker.ArmorPenetration * 100]} % de l'armure de la cible et inflige {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_ArmorBreaker.DmgCoef * 100]} % des dégâts de l'arme.
subjects.es_description: Un potente embate que penetra en un {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Ability_WarHammer_ArmorBreaker.ArmorPenetration * 100]} % la armadura del objetivo e inflige un {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_ArmorBreaker.DmgCoef * 100]} % de daño de arma.
subjects.it_description: Una potente oscillazione che penetra un {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Ability_WarHammer_ArmorBreaker.ArmorPenetration * 100]}% dell'armatura del bersaglio e infligge un {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_ArmorBreaker.DmgCoef * 100]}% dei danni da arma.
subjects.pl_description: Potężny cios, ignorujący {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Ability_WarHammer_ArmorBreaker.ArmorPenetration * 100]}% pancerza celu i zadający {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_ArmorBreaker.DmgCoef * 100]}% obrażeń od broni.
subjects.pt_description: Um golpe poderoso que penetra {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Ability_WarHammer_ArmorBreaker.ArmorPenetration * 100]}% da armadura do alvo e causa {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_ArmorBreaker.DmgCoef * 100]}% do dano de arma.
subjects.en_parsed_description: A Powerful swing that penetrates 35.0% of the Target's armor and deals 140.0% Weapon damage.
subjects.de_parsed_description: Ein mächtiger Schwung, der 35.0 % der Rüstung des Ziels durchdringt und 140.0 % Waffenschaden verursacht.
subjects.fr_parsed_description: Un coup puissant qui pénètre 35.0 % de l'armure de la cible et inflige 140.0 % des dégâts de l'arme.
subjects.es_parsed_description: Un potente embate que penetra en un 35.0 % la armadura del objetivo e inflige un 140.0 % de daño de arma.
subjects.it_parsed_description: Una potente oscillazione che penetra un 35.0% dell'armatura del bersaglio e infligge un 140.0% dei danni da arma.

subjects.pt_parsed_description: Um golpe poderoso que penetra 35.0% da armadura do alvo e causa 140.0% do dano de arma.

subjects.name: Epitome Of Bonk!
subjects.description: Increase Armor Penetration by {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_Juggernaut_LightHeavyPenetrate.ArmorPenetration * 100]}% for all War Hammer Standard attacks.
subjects.parsed_description: Increase Armor Penetration by 10.0% for all War Hammer Standard attacks.
subjects.en_description: Increase Armor Penetration by {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_Juggernaut_LightHeavyPenetrate.ArmorPenetration * 100]}% for all War Hammer Standard attacks.
subjects.de_description: Erhöht die Rüstungsdurchdringung für alle Kriegshammer-Standardangriffe um {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_Juggernaut_LightHeavyPenetrate.ArmorPenetration * 100]} %.
subjects.fr_description: Augmente la pénétration d'armure de {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_Juggernaut_LightHeavyPenetrate.ArmorPenetration * 100]} % pour toutes les attaques standard du marteau d'armes.
subjects.es_description: Aumenta en un {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_Juggernaut_LightHeavyPenetrate.ArmorPenetration * 100]} % la penetración de armadura para todos los ataques normales con martillos de guerra.
subjects.it_description: Aumenta la penetrazione dell'armatura di un {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_Juggernaut_LightHeavyPenetrate.ArmorPenetration * 100]}% per tutti gli attacchi standard del martello da guerra.
subjects.pl_description: Zwiększa penetrację pancerza o {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_Juggernaut_LightHeavyPenetrate.ArmorPenetration * 100]}% wszystkich standardowych ataków młota bojowego.
subjects.pt_description: Aumenta a penetração da armadura em {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_Juggernaut_LightHeavyPenetrate.ArmorPenetration * 100]}% para todos os ataques normais do Martelo de Guerra.
subjects.en_parsed_description: Increase Armor Penetration by 10.0% for all War Hammer Standard attacks.
subjects.de_parsed_description: Erhöht die Rüstungsdurchdringung für alle Kriegshammer-Standardangriffe um 10.0 %.
subjects.fr_parsed_description: Augmente la pénétration d'armure de 10.0 % pour toutes les attaques standard du marteau d'armes.
subjects.es_parsed_description: Aumenta en un 10.0 % la penetración de armadura para todos los ataques normales con martillos de guerra.
subjects.it_parsed_description: Aumenta la penetrazione dell'armatura di un 10.0% per tutti gli attacchi standard del martello da guerra.
subjects.pl_parsed_description: Zwiększa penetrację pancerza o 10.0% wszystkich standardowych ataków młota bojowego.
subjects.pt_parsed_description: Aumenta a penetração da armadura em 10.0% para todos os ataques normais do Martelo de Guerra.

subjects.name: Exhaustive Attacks
subjects.description: All Warhammer abilities apply Exhaust, slowing target's stamina regeneration by {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_ExhaustOnHit.StaminaRate * -100]}% for {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_ExhaustOnHit.BaseDuration]} seconds. (Does not stack)
subjects.parsed_description: All Warhammer abilities apply Exhaust, slowing target's stamina regeneration by 15.0% for 5.0 seconds. (Does not stack)
subjects.en_description: All Warhammer abilities apply Exhaust, slowing target's stamina regeneration by {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_ExhaustOnHit.StaminaRate * -100]}% for {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_ExhaustOnHit.BaseDuration]} seconds. (Does not stack)
subjects.de_description: Alle Kriegshammer-Fertigkeiten verursachen Erschöpfung, die die Ausdauerregeneration des Ziels für {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_ExhaustOnHit.BaseDuration]} Sekunden um {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_ExhaustOnHit.StaminaRate * -100]} % verringert. (Ist nicht stapelbar.)
subjects.fr_description: Les capacités du marteau d'armes appliquent épuisement, réduisant de {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_ExhaustOnHit.StaminaRate * -100]} % la régénération de vitalité de la cible pendant {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_ExhaustOnHit.BaseDuration]} secondes. (non cumulable).
subjects.es_description: Todas las habilidades de martillo aplican Extenuación, lo que ralentiza la regeneración de vitalidad del objetivo en un {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_ExhaustOnHit.StaminaRate * -100]} % durante {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_ExhaustOnHit.BaseDuration]} s (no se acumula).
subjects.it_description: Tutte le abilità del martello da guerra applicano Sfinimento, che rallenta la rigenerazione di energia del bersaglio di un {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_ExhaustOnHit.StaminaRate * -100]}% per {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_ExhaustOnHit.BaseDuration]} secondi (non è cumulabile)
subjects.pl_description: Wszystkie umiejętności młota bojowego nakładają na cel wyczerpanie zmniejszające jego szybkość regeneracji wytrzymałości o {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_ExhaustOnHit.StaminaRate * -100]}% na {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_ExhaustOnHit.BaseDuration]} s (nie kumuluje się).
subjects.pt_description: Todas as habilidades do Martelo de Guerra aplicam Exaustão, reduzindo a Regeneração de Vigor do alvo em {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_ExhaustOnHit.StaminaRate * -100]}% durante {[StatusEffects.Warhammer_Pass_ExhaustOnHit.BaseDuration]} s. (Não acumula.)
subjects.en_parsed_description: All Warhammer abilities apply Exhaust, slowing target's stamina regeneration by 15.0% for 5.0 seconds. (Does not stack)
subjects.de_parsed_description: Alle Kriegshammer-Fertigkeiten verursachen Erschöpfung, die die Ausdauerregeneration des Ziels für 5.0 Sekunden um 15.0 % verringert. (Ist nicht stapelbar.)
subjects.fr_parsed_description: Les capacités du marteau d'armes appliquent épuisement, réduisant de 15.0 % la régénération de vitalité de la cible pendant 5.0 secondes. (non cumulable).
subjects.es_parsed_description: Todas las habilidades de martillo aplican Extenuación, lo que ralentiza la regeneración de vitalidad del objetivo en un 15.0 % durante 5.0 s (no se acumula).
subjects.it_parsed_description: Tutte le abilità del martello da guerra applicano Sfinimento, che rallenta la rigenerazione di energia del bersaglio di un 15.0% per 5.0 secondi (non è cumulabile)
subjects.pl_parsed_description: Wszystkie umiejętności młota bojowego nakładają na cel wyczerpanie zmniejszające jego szybkość regeneracji wytrzymałości o 15.0% na 5.0 s (nie kumuluje się).
subjects.pt_parsed_description: Todas as habilidades do Martelo de Guerra aplicam Exaustão, reduzindo a Regeneração de Vigor do alvo em 15.0% durante 5.0 s. (Não acumula.)

subjects.name: Mighty Gavel
subjects.description: An overhead leaping attack that crushes down on enemies dealing {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_MightyGavel.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage.
subjects.parsed_description: An overhead leaping attack that crushes down on enemies dealing 160.0% weapon damage.
subjects.en_description: An overhead leaping attack that crushes down on enemies dealing {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_MightyGavel.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage.
subjects.de_description: Ein über Kopf ausgeführter Sprungangriff, mit dem man sich auf Gegner stürzt und {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_MightyGavel.DmgCoef * 100]} % Waffenschaden verursacht.
subjects.fr_description: Une attaque sautée qui s'écrase sur les ennemis et inflige {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_MightyGavel.DmgCoef * 100]} % des dégâts de l'arme.
subjects.es_description: Un ataque con salto hacia delante que machaca a los enemigos e inflige un {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_MightyGavel.DmgCoef * 100]} % de daño de arma.
subjects.it_description: Un attacco con salto che si abbatte sui nemici infliggendo il {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_MightyGavel.DmgCoef * 100]}% dei danni da arma.
subjects.pl_description: Atak z doskoku wyprowadzany znad głowy, zadający wrogom {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_MightyGavel.DmgCoef * 100]}% obrażeń od broni.
subjects.pt_description: Um ataque com salto que esmaga os inimigos, causando {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_MightyGavel.DmgCoef * 100]}% do dano de arma.
subjects.en_parsed_description: An overhead leaping attack that crushes down on enemies dealing 160.0% weapon damage.
subjects.de_parsed_description: Ein über Kopf ausgeführter Sprungangriff, mit dem man sich auf Gegner stürzt und 160.0 % Waffenschaden verursacht.
subjects.fr_parsed_description: Une attaque sautée qui s'écrase sur les ennemis et inflige 160.0 % des dégâts de l'arme.
subjects.es_parsed_description: Un ataque con salto hacia delante que machaca a los enemigos e inflige un 160.0 % de daño de arma.
subjects.it_parsed_description: Un attacco con salto che si abbatte sui nemici infliggendo il 160.0% dei danni da arma.
subjects.pl_parsed_description: Atak z doskoku wyprowadzany znad głowy, zadający wrogom 160.0% obrażeń od broni.
subjects.pt_parsed_description: Um ataque com salto que esmaga os inimigos, causando 160.0% do dano de arma.

subjects.name: Hardened Steel
subjects.description: Adds Grit to Hammer Heavy Attacks, and grants a {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_Juggernaut_HeavyGrit.BaseDamageReduction * 100]}% damage reduction while the Heavy attack Grit is active. \n\n(Grit is an added stagger resistance that stops attacks from being interrupted by reactions)
subjects.parsed_description:
Adds Grit to Hammer Heavy Attacks, and grants a 20.0% damage reduction while the Heavy attack Grit is active.

(Grit is an added stagger resistance that stops attacks from being interrupted by reactions)
subjects.en_description: Adds Grit to Hammer Heavy Attacks, and grants a {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_Juggernaut_HeavyGrit.BaseDamageReduction * 100]}% damage reduction while the Heavy attack Grit is active. \n\n(Grit is an added stagger resistance that stops attacks from being interrupted by reactions)
subjects.de_description: Fügt schweren Angriffen mit dem Hammer „Mut“ hinzu und verleiht Schadensreduktion in Höhe von {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_Juggernaut_HeavyGrit.BaseDamageReduction * 100]} %, während Mut bei schwerem Angriff aktiv ist. \n\n(„Mut“ erhöht die Taumel-Resistenz, damit Angriffe nicht durch Reaktionen unterbrochen werden können.)
subjects.fr_description: Les attaques lourdes au marteau octroient du courage et {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_Juggernaut_HeavyGrit.BaseDamageReduction * 100]} % de réduction des dégâts tant que le bonus reste actif. \n\n(courage est un effet de résistance qui empêche les attaques d'être interrompues par une réaction).
subjects.es_description: Añade coraje a los ataques pesados con martillo, y otorga un {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_Juggernaut_HeavyGrit.BaseDamageReduction * 100]} % de reducción del daño mientras el coraje del ataque pesado siga activo. \n\n(Coraje es un factor de resistencia a la vacilación adicional que evita la interrupción de ataques por reacciones)
subjects.it_description: Aggiunge Grinta agli attacchi pesanti con martello e conferisce un {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_Juggernaut_HeavyGrit.BaseDamageReduction * 100]}% di riduzione dei danni mentre la Grinta da attacco pesante è attiva. \n\n(Grinta è un'ulteriore resistenza al vacillamento che impedisce l'interruzione degli attacchi tramite reazione)
subjects.pl_description: Dodaje determinację do ataków ciężkich młota bojowego i zmniejsza otrzymywane obrażenia o {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_Juggernaut_HeavyGrit.BaseDamageReduction * 100]}%, gdy determinacja ataku ciężkiego jest aktywna. \n\n(Determinacja jest dodatkową odpornością na zachwianie, która nie pozwala na przerwanie ataków).
subjects.pt_description: Adiciona Afinco a Ataques Pesados com o Martelo e concede {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_Juggernaut_HeavyGrit.BaseDamageReduction * 100]}% de redução de dano enquanto o Afinco de Ataque Pesado está ativo. \n\n(Afinco é uma resistência adicional ao atordoamento que impede que os ataques sejam interrompidos por reações.)
subjects.en_parsed_description:
Adds Grit to Hammer Heavy Attacks, and grants a 20.0% damage reduction while the Heavy attack Grit is active.

(Grit is an added stagger resistance that stops attacks from being interrupted by reactions)
subjects.de_parsed_description:
Fügt schweren Angriffen mit dem Hammer „Mut“ hinzu und verleiht Schadensreduktion in Höhe von 20.0 %, während Mut bei schwerem Angriff aktiv ist.

(„Mut“ erhöht die Taumel-Resistenz, damit Angriffe nicht durch Reaktionen unterbrochen werden können.)
subjects.fr_parsed_description:
Les attaques lourdes au marteau octroient du courage et 20.0 % de réduction des dégâts tant que le bonus reste actif.

(courage est un effet de résistance qui empêche les attaques d'être interrompues par une réaction).
subjects.es_parsed_description:
Añade coraje a los ataques pesados con martillo, y otorga un 20.0 % de reducción del daño mientras el coraje del ataque pesado siga activo.

(Coraje es un factor de resistencia a la vacilación adicional que evita la interrupción de ataques por reacciones)
subjects.it_parsed_description:
Aggiunge Grinta agli attacchi pesanti con martello e conferisce un 20.0% di riduzione dei danni mentre la Grinta da attacco pesante è attiva.

(Grinta è un'ulteriore resistenza al vacillamento che impedisce l'interruzione degli attacchi tramite reazione)
subjects.pl_parsed_description:
Dodaje determinację do ataków ciężkich młota bojowego i zmniejsza otrzymywane obrażenia o 20.0%, gdy determinacja ataku ciężkiego jest aktywna.

(Determinacja jest dodatkową odpornością na zachwianie, która nie pozwala na przerwanie ataków).
subjects.pt_parsed_description:
Adiciona Afinco a Ataques Pesados com o Martelo e concede 20.0% de redução de dano enquanto o Afinco de Ataque Pesado está ativo.

(Afinco é uma resistência adicional ao atordoamento que impede que os ataques sejam interrompidos por reações.)

subjects.name: Indomitable
subjects.description: Adds Grit to the attack, making the attack unstoppable.
subjects.parsed_description: Adds Grit to the attack, making the attack unstoppable.
subjects.en_description: Adds Grit to the attack, making the attack unstoppable.
subjects.de_description: Hinrichtung erhält „Mut“ beim Angriff, wodurch der Angriff unaufhaltbar wird.
subjects.fr_description: Confère du courage à l'attaque, ce qui rend l'attaque inarrêtable.
subjects.es_description: Añade coraje al ataque, por lo que resulta imparable.
subjects.it_description: Aggiunge Grinta all'attacco, rendendolo inarrestabile.
subjects.pl_description: Dodaje determinację do ataku, co czyni go niemożliwym do zatrzymania.
subjects.pt_description: Adiciona Afinco ao ataque, tornando-o Implacável.
subjects.en_parsed_description: Adds Grit to the attack, making the attack unstoppable.
subjects.de_parsed_description: Hinrichtung erhält „Mut“ beim Angriff, wodurch der Angriff unaufhaltbar wird.
subjects.fr_parsed_description: Confère du courage à l'attaque, ce qui rend l'attaque inarrêtable.
subjects.es_parsed_description: Añade coraje al ataque, por lo que resulta imparable.
subjects.it_parsed_description: Aggiunge Grinta all'attacco, rendendolo inarrestabile.
subjects.pl_parsed_description: Dodaje determinację do ataku, co czyni go niemożliwym do zatrzymania.
subjects.pt_parsed_description: Adiciona Afinco ao ataque, tornando-o Implacável.

subjects.name: Wrecking Ball
subjects.description: Strike the ground around a target with Hammer dealing {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_WreckingBall.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and flattening enemy.
subjects.parsed_description: Strike the ground around a target with Hammer dealing 120.0% weapon damage and flattening enemy.
subjects.en_description: Strike the ground around a target with Hammer dealing {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_WreckingBall.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and flattening enemy.
subjects.de_description: Schlage mit dem Hammer in der Nähe des Ziels auf den Boden, um {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_WreckingBall.DmgCoef * 100]} % Waffenschaden zu verursachen und das Ziel zu plätten.
subjects.fr_description: Frappe le sol autour de la cible avec le marteau pour infliger {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_WreckingBall.DmgCoef * 100]} % des dégâts de l'arme et aplatir l'ennemi.
subjects.es_description: Golpea el suelo en torno a un objetivo con un martillo, lo que inflige un {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_WreckingBall.DmgCoef * 100]} % de daño de arma y aplasta al enemigo.
subjects.it_description: Colpisci il terreno attorno a un bersaglio con il martello, infliggendo un {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_WreckingBall.DmgCoef * 100]}% dei danni da arma e schiacciando i nemici.
subjects.pl_description: Uderz młotem w ziemię obok celu, zadając mu {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_WreckingBall.DmgCoef * 100]}% obrażeń od broni i powalając go na glebę.
subjects.pt_description: Golpeie o solo ao redor de um alvo com o Martelo, causando {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_WreckingBall.DmgCoef * 100]}% do dano de arma e achatando o inimigo.
subjects.en_parsed_description: Strike the ground around a target with Hammer dealing 120.0% weapon damage and flattening enemy.
subjects.de_parsed_description: Schlage mit dem Hammer in der Nähe des Ziels auf den Boden, um 120.0 % Waffenschaden zu verursachen und das Ziel zu plätten.
subjects.fr_parsed_description: Frappe le sol autour de la cible avec le marteau pour infliger 120.0 % des dégâts de l'arme et aplatir l'ennemi.
subjects.es_parsed_description: Golpea el suelo en torno a un objetivo con un martillo, lo que inflige un 120.0 % de daño de arma y aplasta al enemigo.

subjects.es_parsed_description: Ahora, Senda del destino hace vacilar a todos los objetivos en su camino.
subjects.it_parsed_description: Ora Sentiero del destino fa vacillare tutti i bersagli sulla propria traiettoria.
subjects.pl_parsed_description: Droga przeznaczenia wywołuje zachwianie u wszystkich celów.
subjects.pt_parsed_description: O Caminho do Destino agora atordoa todos os alvos em seu caminho.

subjects.name: Prevailing Spirit
subjects.description: Regain {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_CrowdCrusher_HPOnCCHit.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}% of damage dealt as Health when using a Crowd Crusher ability.
subjects.parsed_description: Regain 35.0% of damage dealt as Health when using a Crowd Crusher ability.
subjects.en_description: Regain {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_CrowdCrusher_HPOnCCHit.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}% of damage dealt as Health when using a Crowd Crusher ability.
subjects.de_description: Du regenerierst {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_CrowdCrusher_HPOnCCHit.DmgPctToHealth * 100]} % des mit Kriegshämmern verursachten Schadens als Gesundheit, wenn du Massenbrecher einsetzt.
subjects.fr_description: Vous soigne à hauteur de {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_CrowdCrusher_HPOnCCHit.DmgPctToHealth * 100]} % des dégâts subis lorsque vous utilisez une capacité de broyage de masse.
subjects.es_description: Recuperas un {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_CrowdCrusher_HPOnCCHit.DmgPctToHealth * 100]} % del daño infligido en forma de salud al usar una habilidad Aplastamultitudes.
subjects.it_description: Cura te stesso di un {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_CrowdCrusher_HPOnCCHit.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}% dei danni inflitti quando usi un'abilità Schiacciafolla.
subjects.pl_description: Podczas używania umiejętności rozganiacza tłumów przywraca zdrowie o wartości {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_CrowdCrusher_HPOnCCHit.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}% zadanych obrażeń.
subjects.pt_description: Recupera Saúde igual a {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_CrowdCrusher_HPOnCCHit.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}% do dano causado ao usar uma habilidade Arrasa-Multidões.

subjects.name: Clean and Refreshed
subjects.description: Clear Out's cooldown is reduced by {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Upgrade_WarHammer_ClearOut_CDRonHit.CooldownTimer * -100]}% per enemy hit with the ability.
subjects.parsed_description: Clear Out's cooldown is reduced by 5.0% per enemy hit with the ability.
subjects.en_description: Clear Out's cooldown is reduced by {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Upgrade_WarHammer_ClearOut_CDRonHit.CooldownTimer * -100]}% per enemy hit with the ability.
subjects.de_description: Die Abklingzeit von Vertreiben wird pro Ziel, das mit der Fertigkeit getroffen wurde, um {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Upgrade_WarHammer_ClearOut_CDRonHit.CooldownTimer * -100]} % verkürzt.
subjects.fr_description: Réduit de {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Upgrade_WarHammer_ClearOut_CDRonHit.CooldownTimer * -100]} % le temps de recharge de Marteau balayeur pour chaque ennemi frappé avec la capacité.
subjects.es_description: El tiempo de recarga de Barrido se reduce en un {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Upgrade_WarHammer_ClearOut_CDRonHit.CooldownTimer * -100]} % por cada enemigo al que golpee la habilidad.
subjects.it_description: Riduce il tempo di ricarica di Sgombero di un {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Upgrade_WarHammer_ClearOut_CDRonHit.CooldownTimer * -100]}% per ogni nemico colpito dall'abilità.
subjects.pl_description: Skraca czas odnowienia umiejętności „Z drogi!” o {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Upgrade_WarHammer_ClearOut_CDRonHit.CooldownTimer * -100]}% za każdego trafionego nią wroga.
subjects.pt_description: O tempo de recarga de Para Trás é reduzido em {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Upgrade_WarHammer_ClearOut_CDRonHit.CooldownTimer * -100]}% para cada inimigo atingido com a habilidade.
subjects.en_parsed_description: Clear Out's cooldown is reduced by 5.0% per enemy hit with the ability.
subjects.de_parsed_description: Die Abklingzeit von Vertreiben wird pro Ziel, das mit der Fertigkeit getroffen wurde, um 5.0 % verkürzt.

subjects.name: Swing Away
subjects.description: Using Clear Out on a target grants Haste, increasing movement speed by {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_ClearOut_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% for {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_ClearOut_Haste.BaseDuration]} Seconds.
subjects.parsed_description: Using Clear Out on a target grants Haste, increasing movement speed by 30.0% for 3.0 Seconds.
subjects.en_description: Using Clear Out on a target grants Haste, increasing movement speed by {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_ClearOut_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% for {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_ClearOut_Haste.BaseDuration]} Seconds.
subjects.de_description: Der Einsatz von Vertreiben gegen ein Ziel verleiht dir Eile, wodurch sich dein Bewegungstempo für {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_ClearOut_Haste.BaseDuration]} Sekunden um {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_ClearOut_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]} % erhöht.
subjects.fr_description: Frapper une cible avec Marteau balayeur confère célérité et augmente la vitesse de déplacement de {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_ClearOut_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]} % pendant {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_ClearOut_Haste.BaseDuration]} secondes.
subjects.es_description: Al usar Barrido contra un objetivo obtienes Celeridad, lo que aumenta la velocidad de movimiento en un {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_ClearOut_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]} % durante {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_ClearOut_Haste.BaseDuration]} s.
subjects.it_description: Usare Sgombero su un bersaglio garantisce Fretta, che aumenta la velocità di movimento di un {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_ClearOut_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% per {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_ClearOut_Haste.BaseDuration]} secondi.
subjects.pl_description: Trafienie celu umiejętnością „Z drogi!” zapewnia przyspieszenie zwiększające szybkość ruchu o {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_ClearOut_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% na {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_ClearOut_Haste.BaseDuration]} s.
subjects.pt_description: Usar Para Trás em um alvo concede Pressa, aumentando a velocidade de movimento em {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_ClearOut_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% durante {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_ClearOut_Haste.BaseDuration]} s.

subjects.name: Resurgence
subjects.description: After 2 Light attacks with the Warhammer, debuff durations on player are reduced by 25%. Can only trigger once every 5 seconds.
subjects.parsed_description: After 2 Light attacks with the Warhammer, debuff durations on player are reduced by 25%. Can only trigger once every 5 seconds.
subjects.en_description: After 2 Light attacks with the Warhammer, debuff durations on player are reduced by 25%. Can only trigger once every 5 seconds.
subjects.de_description: Nach 2 leichten Angriffen mit dem Kriegshammer wird die Dauer von aktiven Schwächungen auf dem Spieler um 25 % verringert. Kann nur alle 5 Sekunden ausgelöst werden.
subjects.fr_description: Après 2 attaques légères avec le marteau d'armes, la durée des affaiblissements que vous subissez est réduite de 25 %. Se déclenche une fois toutes les 5 secondes.
subjects.es_description: Tras 2 ataques ligeros con el martillo de guerra, la duración de los estados negativos del jugador se reducen en un 25 %. Solo se puede activar una vez cada 5 s.
subjects.it_description: Dopo 2 attacchi leggeri con un martello da guerra, la durata dei depotenziamenti sul giocatore viene ridotta del 25%. Può essere attivato solo una volta ogni 5 secondi.
subjects.pl_description: Wyprowadzenie 2 lekkich ataków młotem bojowym skraca o 25% czas trwania negatywnych efektów u gracza. Można skorzystać z tej umiejętności raz na 5 sekund.
subjects.pt_description: Após 2 Ataques Leves com o Martelo de Guerra, a duração de debuffs no jogador é reduzida em 25%. Só pode ser acionado uma vez a cada 5 segundos.

subjects.name: Aftershock
subjects.description: Whenever a target is affected by a Crowd Control effect, they are slowed by {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_Ult_SlowOnCC.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% for {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_Ult_SlowOnCC.BaseDuration]} Seconds.
subjects.parsed_description: Whenever a target is affected by a Crowd Control effect, they are slowed by 20.0% for 4.0 Seconds.
subjects.en_description: Whenever a target is affected by a Crowd Control effect, they are slowed by {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_Ult_SlowOnCC.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% for {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_Ult_SlowOnCC.BaseDuration]} Seconds.
subjects.de_description: Wenn ein Ziel von Gruppenkontrolle beeinflusst wird, wird es für {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_Ult_SlowOnCC.BaseDuration]} Sekunden um {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_Ult_SlowOnCC.MoveSpeedMod * -100]} % verlangsamt.
subjects.fr_description: Lorsqu'une cible est affectée par un effet de contrôle de foule, elle est ralentie de {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_Ult_SlowOnCC.MoveSpeedMod * -100]} % pendant {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_Ult_SlowOnCC.BaseDuration]} secondes.
subjects.es_description: Cuando un objetivo se ve afectado por un efecto de control de multitudes, se ralentiza un {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_Ult_SlowOnCC.MoveSpeedMod * -100]} % durante {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_Ult_SlowOnCC.BaseDuration]} s.
subjects.it_description: Ogni volta che un bersaglio è affetto da un effetto di controllo di gruppo, viene rallentato di un {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_Ult_SlowOnCC.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% per {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_Ult_SlowOnCC.BaseDuration]} secondi.
subjects.pl_description: Gdy cel znajdzie się pod wpływem któregoś z efektów obezwładniających, zostanie spowolniony o {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_Ult_SlowOnCC.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% na {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_Ult_SlowOnCC.BaseDuration]} s.
subjects.pt_description: Sempre que um alvo é afetado por um efeito de Controle, sofre Lentidão de {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_Ult_SlowOnCC.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% durante {[StatusEffects.WarHammer_Ult_SlowOnCC.BaseDuration]} s.
